body:
Even though I am banned on Avicus (https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/104caa2b9) that doesn't stop me from trying to improve it! I have started developing a MCPE server for avicus with an identical lobby, over 4 new Nebula maps (all my me!!) and a dropper map that is extremely hard. I have screenshots on my phone but my WiFi is limited right now so I can't add it to this thread. Just trust me that it's going to be awesome! If anyone would like to jump in on this project let me know!

PS. (Avicus exclusive) I am calling it NebulaPE but when it fully gets released, Avicus will rise!
Just like Bladestorm for Mineplex.

title: NebulaPE - Coming Soon!

replies.body: This sounds AWESOME! I occasionally play MCPE, so this would be epic!
